title: So I got in a car accident
body:
Someone calls the insurance company for me, since my head is swimming. They tell him the details before he asks to speak to the person who was in the accident.
"Hello?" I mutter.
He says "Hey, how are you?"
....

....
I literally couldn't find an answer for a moment.
"... I was in a car accident, how are you?"
The fuck kind of question is that?
